thruputs

Tooltips

Add a tooltip to a tag element. Tooltips may be placed above, below, left, or right of an element.

Arguments

.tag

A tag element.

text

The tooltip text.

placement

One of "top", "right", "bottom", or "left" specifying what side of the tag element the tooltip appears on.
